text: The 1120s BC is a decade which lasted from 1129 BC to 1120 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1126 BC—Thymoetes, legendary King of Athens, dies childless after a reign of 8 years. He is succeeded by his designated heir Melanthus of Pylos, a fifth-generation descendant of Neleus who had reportedly assisted him in battle against the Boeotians. * 1122 BC—Legendary founding emigration of Gija to Gija Joseon. * 1122 BC —The Zhou Dynasty was founded. * c. 1120 BC—Destruction of Troy. ==Significant people==
title: 1120s BC
